modul.name: AdsrLinTrigger
modul.opcode: /* Triggered linear ADSR envelope */ opcode AdsrLinTrigger, k, kiiiiii ktrigger, iamp, iatk, idec, islev, istime, irel xin ktrigger limit ktrigger, 0, 1 klasttrigger init 0 if (klasttrigger == 0 && ktrigger == 1) then kstart = 1 else kstart = 0 endif reset: if (kstart < 1) goto contin reinit reset contin: kenv linseg 0, iatk, 1, idec, islev, istime, islev, irel, 0 rireturn kenv = iamp*kenv klasttrigger = ktrigger xout kenv endop
